習.definition: (bound form) to practice; to study; habit; custom

習以成俗.definition: to become accustomed to sth through long practice

習作.definition: (writing, drawing, calligraphy etc) to apply oneself to producing practice pieces; a practice piece; an exercise

習俗移性.definition: one's habits change with long custom

習大大.definition: Papa Xi, nickname for Xi Jinping 習近平|习近平[Xi2 Jin4 ping2]

習得.definition: to learn; to acquire (some skill through practice); acquisition

習得性無助感.pinyin: xi2 de2 xing4 wu2 zhu4 gan3

習性.definition: character acquired through long habit; habits and properties

習慣.definition: habit; custom; usual practice; to be used to; CL:個|个[ge4]

習慣成自然.definition: habit becomes nature (idiom); get used to something and it seems inevitable; second nature

習慣用語.definition: idiom; idiomatic expression; habitual form of speech (grammar)

習慣自然.definition: habit becomes nature (idiom); get used to something and it seems inevitable; second nature; same as 習慣成自然|习惯成自然

習慣若自然.definition: habit becomes nature (idiom); get used to something and it seems inevitable; second nature; same as 習慣成自然|习惯成自然

習水.definition: Xishui county in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou

習水縣.definition: Xishui county in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou

習習.definition: (of the wind) blowing gently; abundant; flying

習近平.definition: Xi Jinping (1953-), PRC politician, General Secretary of the CCP from 2012, president of the PRC from 2013
